attributes.action: Change the sexual age-of-consent laws to protect sixteen and seventeen year-olds
attributes.additional_details: Now it is legal for someone of any age to engage in sexual activity with a sixteen-year-old. This leaves the door open for what is effectively legal grooming of young people, which can cause long-term psychological harm.
attributes.background: Present laws are open to predatory people seeking to groom much younger people for sex. A staggered age-of-consent system that allowed young people to engage in sex with those of a similar age, whilst preventing older people from sex with 16 & 17 year-olds, would help prevent abuse.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Make it illegal for people over 21 to have sexual intercourse with under 18s:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644607
